==Korean==

===Hanja===
{{ko-hanja|hangeul=안|eumhun=|rv=an|mr=an|y=an}}

# ([[기러기]] 안, ''gireogi-''): [[wild goose]], whose [[skein]] flies in [[wedge]] or [[cuneiform]], in contrast with [[鵝]] ([[거위]] 아, ''geowi-a''), the [[w:Domesticated goose|domestic goose]] that would not fly at all.

====Compounds====
* [[家雁]] ([[가안]], ga-an) domestic goose, ''literally'', house goose.

====See also====
* {{l|ko|鵝}} ([[거위]] 아, ''geowi-a'') [[domesticated goose]] [[w:Domesticated goose|^]]
* {{l|ko|鵠}} ([[고니]] 곡, ''goni-gok'') [[swan]]
* {{l|ko|鳧}} ([[물오리]] 부, ''mur-ori-bu'') [[mallard]]
* {{l|ko|鷺}} ([[해오리]] 로, ''hae-ori-ro'') [[heron]], [[egret]]
* {{l|ko|鶴}} ([[두루미]] 학, ''durumi-hak'') [[crane]]
* {{l|ko|鸛}} ([[한새]] 관, ''han-sae-gwan'') [[stork]], ''literally'', "big bird"
* {{l|ko|鸛}} ([[황새]] 관, ''hwang-sae-gwan'') [[stork]], ''literally'', "big bird"
